publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4194 Adam Ingram: The Draft Adoption (Disclosure of Information and Medical Information about Natural Parents) (Scotland) Regulations 2009—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Adoption (Disclosure of Information and Medical Information about Natural Parents) (Scotland) Regulations 2009 be approved. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop*

S3M-4194 Adam Ingram: The Draft Adoption (Disclosure of Information and Medical Information about Natural Parents) (Scotland) Regulations 2009—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Adoption (Disclosure of Information and Medical Information about Natural Parents) (Scotland) Regulations 2009 be approved. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop
